page.title: 03Principal features
page.content: This block is to the north of Frome. Orchardleigh park has a Victorian house in its grounds .There is a lake there as well. A church is on an island in the lake. It is called St. Mary's church. Also near Orchardleigh is {Lullington}village. It is very pretty with its thatched cottages and old village pump. Lullington also has a small early Norman church called All Saints church. The country side around here is dairy farming. There is a big Express Dairy at Oldford that sends milk to London. The{River Frome} runs through the area on its way to the River Avon. There is only one main road, the A361 to Bath. Stephanie Bishop
